categories.name: Audiovisual
categories.description: Mods which strictly affect audio or visuals.  This category is often superseded by other categories.

subcategories.name: Audiovisual - Animations & Physics
subcategories.description: Mods which add or modify animations or physics.

subcategories.name: Audiovisual - Lighting & Weather
subcategories.description: Mods which add or modify lighting or weather.

subcategories.name: Audiovisual - Models & Textures
subcategories.description: Mods which provide models, textures, or shaders.

subcategories.name: Audiovisual - Post-processing
subcategories.description: Mods which perform post processing or include a post-processing preset.

subcategories.name: Audiovisual - Sounds & Music
subcategories.description: Mods which add or modify sounds or music.

categories.name: Character Appearance
categories.description: Mods that modify the appearance of characters or add new options for character creation.

subcategories.name: Character Appearance - Body Mods
subcategories.description: Mods that adjust body shapes or textures.

subcategories.name: Character Appearance - Face Parts
subcategories.description: Mods that add new face parts such as hairs, beards, brows, or eyes.

subcategories.name: Character Appearance - NPC Overhauls
subcategories.description: Mods that overhaul NPC appearance.

subcategories.name: Character Appearance - Overlays
subcategories.description: Mods that add new overlays such as warpaints, tattoos, or freckles.

categories.name: Fixes
categories.description: Mods which fix issues or bugs without adding new content.

subcategories.name: Fixes - Stability & Performance
subcategories.description: Fixes which specifically address game stability or performance.

subcategories.name: Fixes - Patches
subcategories.description: Fixes which make mods compatible with each other.

categories.name: Gameplay
categories.description: Mods which modify game mechanics, paradigms, balance, user interfaces, or events.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - AI & Combat
subcategories.description: Mods which modify character behavior, combat mechanics, or enemy strength in general.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - Classes & Races
subcategories.description: Mods which add or modify character classes or races.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - Crafting
subcategories.description: Mods which modify existing crafting systems or add new ones.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - Economy & Item Balance
subcategories.description: Mods which modify the acquisition or stats of items.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - Immersion & Role-playing
subcategories.description: Mods which specifically aid player immersion or role-playing.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - Magic & Abilities
subcategories.description: Mods which add new abilities or spells.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - Quests & Stories
subcategories.description: Mods which add or modify quests or stories.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - Skills & Perks
subcategories.description: Mods which add or modify skills or perks.

subcategories.name: Gameplay - User Interface
subcategories.description: Mods which add or modify user interface components.

categories.name: Items
categories.description: Mods which add new inventory items to the game.

subcategories.name: Items - Armor, Clothing, & Accessories
subcategories.description: Mods that add items that can be worn such as armor, clothing, jewelry, cloaks, and bags.

subcategories.name: Items - Ingestibles
subcategories.description: Mods that add items you can eat or drink.

subcategories.name: Items - Tools & Clutter
subcategories.description: Mods that add items that cannot be worn, ingested, or used as a weapon.

subcategories.name: Items - Weapons
subcategories.description: Mods that add sticks you can stab, squish, or shoot people with.

categories.name: Locations
categories.description: Mods which add or modify locations ingame.

subcategories.name: Locations - New Dungeons
subcategories.description: Mods which add new areas where you can encounter and fight enemies.

subcategories.name: Locations - New Lands
subcategories.description: Mods which add completely new lands to explore.

subcategories.name: Locations - New Player Homes
subcategories.description: Mods which add new player homes.

subcategories.name: Locations - New Structures & Landmarks
subcategories.description: Mods which add new structures or landmarks.

subcategories.name: Locations - Overhauls
subcategories.description: Mods which overhaul existing locations.

categories.name: New Characters
categories.description: Mods which add new animals, characters, or creatures to the game.

subcategories.name: New Characters - Allies
subcategories.description: Mods which add characters that can be allied with the player.

subcategories.name: New Characters - Enemies
subcategories.description: Mods which add characters that are hostile to the player.

subcategories.name: New Characters - Neutral
subcategories.description: Mods which add characters that don't have a disposition to hurt or help the player.

categories.name: Resources
categories.description: Resources to be used by other modders.

subcategories.name: Resources - Audiovisual
subcategories.description: Resources which offer audiovisual content for other modders to use.

subcategories.name: Resources - Frameworks
subcategories.description: Resources which offer a framework or API for other mods to use.

subcategories.name: Resources - Guides & Tutorials
subcategories.description: Resources that provide a guide, tutorial, or general information about modding.

categories.name: Utilities
categories.description: Tools which aid in the creation or management of game content or mods.

subcategories.name: Utilities - Ingame
subcategories.description: Utilities which have an ingame interface.

subcategories.name: Utilities - Patchers
subcategories.description: Utilites which generate patches.

subcategories.name: Utilities - Tools
subcategories.description: Utilities which allow you to create, edit, or manage mod-related files.

category_priorities.description: New items often include new models & textures.
Character appearance mods often include new models & textures.
New races often include new character appearance options.
Changing gameplay often involves fixing issues with the game.
New spells or abilities often include new visual effects.
New or modified quests and stories often improve immersion or include new role-playing opportunities.
New lands often include new gameplay experiences.
New lands often include new characters.
New lands often include new items.
New lands often offer new audiovisual experiences.
New dungeons often include new characters.
New structures and landmarks often include new characters.
Location overhauls often include new audiovisual content.

review_sections.name: Aesthetics
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod look/sound good?  Are the assets high quality?

review_sections.name: Consistency
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod fit in your game?  Does it improve your gameplay experience?

review_sections.name: Performance
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod cause stuttering or a large reduction in average FPS?  Keep the performance of other mods which do similar things in mind.

review_sections.name: Enjoyment
review_sections.prompt: Do you enjoy using the mod?  What do you enjoy about it?

review_sections.name: Aesthetics
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod look good?  Are the textures and models high quality?

review_sections.name: Consistency
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod fit in your game?  Does it improve your gameplay experience?

review_sections.name: Performance
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod cause stuttering or a large reduction in average FPS?  Keep the performance of other mods which do similar things in mind.

review_sections.name: Enjoyment
review_sections.prompt: Do you enjoy using the mod?  What do you enjoy about it?

review_sections.name: Consistency
review_sections.prompt: Does the fix retain the spirit and features of the content it targets?

review_sections.name: Functionality
review_sections.prompt: Does the fix resolve all of the issues with the content it targets, and does it work?

review_sections.name: Aesthetics
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod look/sound good?  Are the assets high quality?

review_sections.name: Consistency
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod fit in your game?  Does the mod improve your gameplay experience?  Is the mod balanced?

review_sections.name: Concept
review_sections.prompt: Do you like the idea behind the mod?  Is the idea original or unique?

review_sections.name: Functionality
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod provide valuable or unique functionality?  Does it do what it's supposed to do, and does it do it well?

review_sections.name: Enjoyment
review_sections.prompt: Do you enjoy using the mod?  What do you enjoy about it?

review_sections.name: Writing
review_sections.prompt: Is the story interesting and engaging? Does the dialogue fit the characters? Are the characters interesting?

review_sections.name: Aesthetics
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod look/sound good?  Are the assets high quality?

review_sections.name: Consistency
review_sections.prompt: Do the items fit in your game?  Are they balanced?  Is acquiring the items too easy or too difficult?

review_sections.name: Concept
review_sections.prompt: Do you like the idea behind the mod?  Is the idea original or unique?

review_sections.name: Enjoyment
review_sections.prompt: Do you enjoy using the mod?  What do you enjoy about it?

review_sections.name: Aesthetics
review_sections.prompt: Does the Location look good?  Is it designed well and are the textures/models high quality?  Does the interior design look good?  Are there unique/custom visuals which make it stand out?

review_sections.name: Performance
review_sections.prompt: Does the mod cause stuttering or a large reduction in average FPS?  Keep the performance of other mods which do similar things in mind.

review_sections.name: Consistency
review_sections.prompt: Does the location fit in your game?  Does it improve your gameplay experience?

review_sections.name: Concept
review_sections.prompt: Do you like the idea behind the mod?  Is the idea original or unique?

review_sections.name: Writing
review_sections.prompt: Is the story interesting and engaging? Does the dialogue fit the characters? Are the characters interesting?

review_sections.name: Voice Acting
review_sections.prompt: Is the recording decent quality? Do the voice actors do a good job of embodying their characters?

review_sections.name: Character Behavior
review_sections.prompt: Do the characters interact with their environment?  Is their behavior realistic?

review_sections.name: Enjoyment
review_sections.prompt: Do you enjoy using the mod?  What do you enjoy about it?

review_sections.name: New Content
review_sections.prompt: What is the quality of new content added by the mod, such as new items, spells or skills?

review_sections.name: Features
review_sections.prompt: Does the player home fit your character's needs?  Are you happy with what it offers?

review_sections.name: Aesthetics
review_sections.prompt: Do the characters look good?  Do they offer unique aesthetics which help them stand out?

review_sections.name: Character Behavior
review_sections.prompt: Do the characters interact with their environment?  Is their behavior realistic?

review_sections.name: Consistency
review_sections.prompt: Do the characters fit in your game?  Do they improve your gameplay experience?

review_sections.name: Concept
review_sections.prompt: Do you like the idea behind the mod?  Is the idea original or unique?

review_sections.name: Enjoyment
review_sections.prompt: Do you enjoy using the mod?  What do you enjoy about it?

review_sections.name: Voice Acting
review_sections.prompt: Is the recording decent quality? Do the voice actors do a good job of embodying their characters?

review_sections.name: Writing
review_sections.prompt: Does the dialogue fit the characters? Are the characters interesting?  Do the characters have a good backstory?

review_sections.name: Aesthetics
review_sections.prompt: Are any provided textures/audio files/models high quality and appealing?  If a GUI is provided, is it intuitive and clean?

review_sections.name: Functionality
review_sections.prompt: Does the resource provide valuable functionality, or save you time?

review_sections.name: Usability
review_sections.prompt: Is it easy to use the resource?  Is the provided documentation sufficient?

review_sections.name: Functionality
review_sections.prompt: Does the utility provide valuable or unique functionality?  Does it do what it's supposed to do, and does it do it well?

review_sections.name: Usability
review_sections.prompt: Is the utility intuitive and easy to use?  Are the learning resources sufficient?  Does using the utility get easier once you've learned the basics?
